definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: It's ideal for autumn wear—gray flannels with blue stripes.
sentences.chinese: 灰色藍條法蘭絨，是秋天理想的料子。

sentences.english: Have flannel PJs replaced your silky negligees?
sentences.chinese: 你的絲質睡裙已經被法蘭絨睡衣取代了？

sentences.english: I notice how bony his shoulders look despite the double layer of flannel shirts.
sentences.chinese: 雖然他穿着法蘭絨襯衫我還是注意到他的肩膀瘦瘦的。

sentences.english: They look like ladies’ red flannel drawers to me.
sentences.chinese: 我看那跟女人穿的紅法蘭絨襯褲一模一樣。

sentences.english: Flannel lining and contrasting stitch details.
sentences.chinese: 法蘭絨襯和反襯一針一線的細節。

sentences.english: The one with a uniform like ladies' red flannel underdrawers .
sentences.chinese: 他穿着像紅色法蘭絨女襯褲一樣的制服。

sentences.english: Never wear tweed coat and flannel trousers.
sentences.chinese: 千萬不要穿花呢上衣配法蘭絨褲。

sentences.english: Inside I found a favorite flannel shirt of Mark's.
sentences.chinese: 回到屋裏，我找出了馬克最喜歡的那件法蘭絨襯衫。

sentences.english: Keep the temp in the bedroom frigid and complain about her flannels and socks.
sentences.chinese: 使臥室氛圍單調，抱怨她的法蘭絨褲子和襪子。

sentences.english: Ill buy my love some flannel, Ill make my love a shroud.
sentences.chinese: 我買來法蘭絨，給我的可愛做壽衣。

sentences.english: There were bandages of red flannel with a mustard dressing , and specifics were also administered.
sentences.chinese: 先用紅法蘭絨敷着芥末來包紮，同時服用持效藥。

sentences.english: Her finger traced the checkered pattern of their flannel sheets.
sentences.chinese: 她的手指描繪出法蘭絨被單上的方格圖案。

sentences.english: She bought a gray flannel coat.
sentences.chinese: 我常穿法蘭絨做貼身衣。

sentences.english: I always wear flannel next my skin.
sentences.chinese: 我常穿法蘭絨做貼身衣。

sentences.english: Students were required to wear blue blazers and gray flannel pants.
sentences.chinese: 他要求學生必須穿藍色運動上衣和灰色法蘭絨褲子。

sentences.english: He is wearing flannels and a blue jacket.
sentences.chinese: 他穿著一條法蘭絨褲子和一件藍夾克。

definition: crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)
to take off costume and makeup/bottom garment (trousers etc)
